casebody.data:
NEWBERNE
v.
CRIME CONTROL, et al. No. 75A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 7, 2005. J. Heydt Philbeck, Raleigh, for Reginald Newberne. Donald K. Phillips, Assistant Attorney General, for Dept. of Crime Control, et al. Mark A. Davis, Raleigh, for Asso. of County Commissioners. J. Michael McGuinness, Elizabethtown, for NC Troopers Association.

AMENDED

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of April 2005 by NC Troopers Association for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Amicus (NC Troopers Association) shall have up to and including the 18th day of April, 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this court. By order of the Court in conference this the 7th day of April 2005."
